Room.Name: Melbourne Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Melbourne Avenue, east of the Melbourne Arena.
Room.LongDescription: You can hear cheers and general screaming coming from the west in the Melbourne Entertainment Arena. The entrance to the arena is located on the south of the facility off of Nagaritha Drive. On the east side of the road, you can see the Generic Clerical Supplies shop, providing clerics with a number of useful items like crucifixes, holy water and other essentials of clerical life.
